refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis:
GsfDocMetaData; GsfDocMetaData* gsf_doc_meta_data_new (void); GsfDocProp* gsf_doc_meta_data_lookup (GsfDocMetaData const *meta, char const *name); void gsf_doc_meta_data_insert (GsfDocMetaData *meta, char *name, GValue *value); void gsf_doc_meta_data_remove (GsfDocMetaData *meta, char const *name); GsfDocProp* gsf_doc_meta_data_steal (GsfDocMetaData *meta, char const *name); void gsf_doc_meta_data_store (GsfDocMetaData *meta, GsfDocProp *prop); void gsf_doc_meta_data_foreach (GsfDocMetaData const *meta, GHFunc func, gpointer user_data); gsize gsf_doc_meta_data_size (GsfDocMetaData const *meta); void gsf_doc_meta_dump (GsfDocMetaData const *meta); GsfDocProp; GsfDocProp* gsf_doc_prop_new (char *name); void gsf_doc_prop_free (GsfDocProp *prop); charconst * gsf_doc_prop_get_name (GsfDocProp const *prop); GValueconst * gsf_doc_prop_get_val (GsfDocProp const *prop); void gsf_doc_prop_set_val (GsfDocProp *prop, GValue *val); charconst * gsf_doc_prop_get_link (GsfDocProp const *prop); void gsf_doc_prop_set_link (GsfDocProp *prop, char *link); void gsf_doc_prop_dump (GsfDocProp const *prop); GsfDocPropVector; GsfDocPropVector* gsf_docprop_vector_new (void); void gsf_docprop_vector_append (GsfDocPropVector *vector, GValue *value); gchar* gsf_docprop_vector_as_string (GsfDocPropVector const *vector); GValueArray* gsf_value_get_docprop_varray (GValue const *value); GsfDocPropVector* gsf_value_get_docprop_vector (GValue const *value);
#define GSF_META_NAME_TITLE #define GSF_META_NAME_DESCRIPTION #define GSF_META_NAME_SUBJECT #define GSF_META_NAME_DATE_MODIFIED #define GSF_META_NAME_DATE_CREATED #define GSF_META_NAME_KEYWORDS #define GSF_META_NAME_LANGUAGE #define GSF_META_NAME_CODEPAGE #define GSF_META_NAME_REVISION_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_EDITING_DURATION #define GSF_META_NAME_TABLE_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_IMAGE_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_OBJECT_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_PAGE_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_PARAGRAPH_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_WORD_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_CHARACTER_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_CELL_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_SPREADSHEET_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_CREATOR #define GSF_META_NAME_TEMPLATE #define GSF_META_NAME_LAST_SAVED_BY #define GSF_META_NAME_LAST_PRINTED #define GSF_META_NAME_PRINT_DATE #define GSF_META_NAME_PRINTED_BY #define GSF_META_NAME_KEYWORD #define GSF_META_NAME_SECURITY #define GSF_META_NAME_CATEGORY #define GSF_META_NAME_PRESENTATION_FORMAT #define GSF_META_NAME_THUMBNAIL #define GSF_META_NAME_GENERATOR #define GSF_META_NAME_LINE_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_SLIDE_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_NOTE_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_HIDDEN_SLIDE_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_MM_CLIP_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_BYTE_COUNT #define GSF_META_NAME_SCALE #define GSF_META_NAME_HEADING_PAIRS #define GSF_META_NAME_DOCUMENT_PARTS #define GSF_META_NAME_MANAGER #define GSF_META_NAME_COMPANY #define GSF_META_NAME_LINKS_DIRTY #define GSF_META_NAME_DICTIONARY #define GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_17 #define GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_18 #define GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_19 #define GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_20 #define GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_21 #define GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_22 #define GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_23 #define GSF_META_NAME_LOCALE_SYSTEM_DEFAULT #define GSF_META_NAME_CASE_SENSITIVE #define GSF_META_NAME_INITIAL_CREATOR

refsect2.title: GsfDocMetaData
refsect2.para: Class representing information about a document, such as creator and time of last modification.

listitem.simpara: a new metadata property collection
the property with name id in meta. The caller can modify the property value and link but not the name.

refsect2.title: gsf_doc_meta_data_insert ()
refsect2.para: Take ownership of name and value and insert a property into meta. If a property exists with name, it is replaced (The link is lost)

listitem.simpara: the id.

refsect2.title: gsf_doc_meta_data_remove ()
refsect2.para: If name does not exist in the collection, do nothing. If name does exist, remove it and its value from the collection

listitem.simpara: the collection
the non-null string name of the property

refsect2.title: gsf_doc_meta_data_foreach ()
refsect2.para: Iterate through each (key, value) pair in this collection

listitem.simpara: the collection
the function called once for each element in the collection
any supplied user data or NULL
the collection
the number of items in this collection

refsect2.title: gsf_doc_meta_dump ()
refsect2.para: A debugging utility to dump the content of meta via g_print

refsect2.title: GsfDocProp
refsect2.para: Class representing a properties of a document.

listitem.simpara: a new GsfDocProp which the caller is responsible for freeing. Takes ownership of name.

refsect2.title: gsf_doc_prop_free ()
refsect2.para: If prop is non NULL free the memory associated with it

listitem.simpara: the name of the property, the caller should not modify the result.
the property
the value of the property, the caller should not modify the result.

refsect2.title: gsf_doc_prop_set_val ()
refsect2.para: Assigns val to prop, and unsets and frees the current value.

listitem.simpara: the current link descriptor of prop. The result should not be freed or modified.

refsect2.title: gsf_doc_prop_set_link ()
refsect2.para: Sets prop's link to link

listitem.simpara: optionally NULL

refsect2.title: gsf_doc_prop_dump ()
refsect2.para: A debugging utility to dump prop as text via g_print New in 1.14.2

refsect2.title: gsf_docprop_vector_new ()
refsect2.para: This function creates a new gsf_docprop_vector object.

listitem.simpara: GsfDocPropVector*

refsect2.title: gsf_docprop_vector_append ()
refsect2.para: Insert a copy of value as the last element of vector.

listitem.simpara: The vector to which the GValue will be added
The GValue to add to vector

refsect2.title: gsf_docprop_vector_as_string ()
refsect2.para: This function returns a string which represents all the GValues in vector. The caller is responsible for freeing the result.

listitem.simpara: The GsfDocPropVector from which GValues will be extracted.
a string of comma-separated values

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_TITLE
refsect2.para: (String) A formal name given to the resource.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_DESCRIPTION
refsect2.para: (String) An account of the content of the resource.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_SUBJECT
refsect2.para: (String) The topic of the content of the resource, typically including keywords.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_DATE_MODIFIED
refsect2.para: (GsfTimestamp) The last time this document was saved.
1.14.0 Moved from dc:date-modified to dc:date.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_DATE_CREATED
refsect2.para: (Date as ISO String) A date associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource (creation/publication date). Moved from gsf:date-created to meta:creation-date. This way can be used correctly by OpenDocument and Gnumeric.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_KEYWORDS
refsect2.para: (GsfDocPropVector of String) Searchable, indexable keywords. Similar to PDF keywords or HTML's meta block.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_LANGUAGE
refsect2.para: (String) The locale language of the intellectual content of the resource (basically xx_YY form for us). 1.14.0 Clarified that this is unique from _NAME_CODEPAGE in msole

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_CODEPAGE
refsect2.para: (UnsignedShort) The MS codepage to encode strings for metadata 1.14.0 Clarified that this is unique from _NAME_CODEPAGE in msole

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_REVISION_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of revision on the document, if appropriate. Moved from gsf:revision-count to meta:editing-cycles. This way can be used correctly by OpenDocument and Gnumeric.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_EDITING_DURATION
refsect2.para: (Date as ISO String) The total-time taken until the last modification. Moved from "gsf" to "meta". This way can be used correctly by OpenDocument and Gnumeric.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_TABLE_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of tables in the document, if appropriate.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_IMAGE_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of images in the document, if appropriate.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_OBJECT_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of objects (OLE and other graphics) in the document, if appropriate.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_PAGE_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of pages in the document, if appropriate.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_PARAGRAPH_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of paragraphs in the document, if appropriate.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_WORD_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of words in the document.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_CHARACTER_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of characters in the document.
TODO See how to sync this with ODF's document-statistic

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_CELL_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of cells in the spread-sheet document, if appropriate.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_SPREADSHEET_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of pages in the document, if appropriate.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_CREATOR
refsect2.para: (String) An entity primarily responsible for making the content of the resource typically a person, organization, or service.
1.14.0 Moved from "gsf" to "dc".

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_TEMPLATE
refsect2.para: (String) The template file that is been used to generate this document.
1.14.0 Moved from "gsf" to "meta"

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_LAST_SAVED_BY
refsect2.para: (String) The entity that made the last change to the document, typically a person, organization, or service.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_LAST_PRINTED
refsect2.para: (GSF_META_NAME_HEADING_PAIRS) The last time this document was printed.
1.14.0 Moved from "gsf" to "dc". 1.14.1 Moved back to "gsf" from "dc".

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_PRINT_DATE
refsect2.para: (GsfTimestamp) Specifies the date and time when the document was last printed.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_PRINTED_BY
refsect2.para: (String) Specifies the name of the last person who printed the document.
1.14.0 Moved from "gsf" to "meta".

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_KEYWORD
refsect2.para: (String) Searchable, indexable keywords. Similar to PDF keywords or HTML's meta block.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_SECURITY
refsect2.para: (Integer) Level of security.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_CATEGORY
refsect2.para: (String) Category of the document. example???

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_PRESENTATION_FORMAT
refsect2.para: (String) Type of presentation, like "On-screen Show", "SlideView" etc.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_THUMBNAIL
refsect2.para: (GsfClipData) Thumbnail data of the document, typically a preview image of the document.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_GENERATOR
refsect2.para: (String) The application that generated this document. AbiWord, Gnumeric, etc...
1.14.0 Moved from "gsf" to "meta".

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_LINE_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of liness in the document.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_SLIDE_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of slides in the presentation document.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_NOTE_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of "notes" in the document.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_HIDDEN_SLIDE_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of hidden-slides in the presentation document.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_MM_CLIP_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of "multi-media" clips in the document.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_BYTE_COUNT
refsect2.para: (Integer) Count of bytes in the document.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_SCALE
refsect2.para: (Boolean) ?????

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_HEADING_PAIRS
refsect2.para: (Vector of string value pairs stored in alternating elements) Store the counts of objects in the document as names 'worksheet' and count '4' From MSOLE

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_DOCUMENT_PARTS
refsect2.para: (Vector of strings) Names of the 'interesting' parts of the document. In spreadsheets this is a list of the sheet names, and the named expressions. From MSOLE

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_MANAGER
refsect2.para: (String) Name of the manager of "CREATOR" entity.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_COMPANY
refsect2.para: (String) Name of the company/organization that the "CREATOR" entity is associated with.
1.14.1 Moved from "gsf:company" to "dc:publisher".

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_LINKS_DIRTY
refsect2.para: (Boolean) ???????

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_DICTIONARY
refsect2.para: (None) Reserved name (PID) for Dictionary

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_17
refsect2.para: (Unknown) User-defined name

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_18
refsect2.para: (Unknown) User-defined name

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_19
refsect2.para: (Boolean) User-defined name

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_20
refsect2.para: (Unknown) User-defined name

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_21
refsect2.para: (Unknown) User-defined name

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_22
refsect2.para: (Boolean) User-defined name

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_MSOLE_UNKNOWN_23
refsect2.para: (i4) User-defined name

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_LOCALE_SYSTEM_DEFAULT
refsect2.para: (Unsigned Integer) Identifier representing the default system locale.

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_CASE_SENSITIVE
refsect2.para: (Unsigned Integer) Identifier representing the case-sensitiveness. of what ?? why is it an integer ??

refsect2.title: GSF_META_NAME_INITIAL_CREATOR
refsect2.para: (String) Specifies the name of the person who created the document initially. 1.14.0 Moved from "gsf" to "meta".
